name: Zapper
introduce: Zapper is an asset management platform for Web3 aims to make Web3 accessible and easy to use. Zapper's main product is the Zapper Dashboard. From the dashboard, users can easily view all their digital investments and adjust their portfolio. Our dashboard makes it simple for users to alter their investing strategies by exchanging assets, providing liquidity in a variety of pools, staking tokens, depositing assets to earn passive income, and studying wallets of public figures to stay on top of the latest trends in Web3.
